author: ekoneil
msg: Add a suite of compiler tests for the NetUI Page Flow compiler.  Generally, these build a faux-webapp containing some Page Flow and diff the generated jpf-struts-config*.xml file and actual output against "gold" files of the same.
- cleaned up leaked InputStream / Readers in the test infrastructure
- cleaned up the execution code to remove unused blocks / commented-out blocks / etc
- reformatted according to generally agreed upon style guidelines
- removed custom Logger class in favor of using commons-logging

- reworked test/ant/build.xml and test/ant/junitCore.xml to loosely couple the compiler tests with the BVTs.  Shouldn't be necessary to run the JUnit BVT suite in order to just run the compiler tests.  To run these, do:
Test: NetUI BVT / compiler tests pass

author: chamikara
msg: A new test case was added to check the Context Hierarchy serialization-deserialization functionality.
Also did some corrections in the Context classes.

author: cutting
msg: Finish even when some threads hung.  Improve status reports.

author: cutting
msg: Improve status reports: Always send final status when done; Have LocalJobRunner log status.
